enhanced_description: Globaltalex Private Limited, operating as Global Talent Exchange, is a fast-growing, next-generation tech recruitment platform launched in 2020. This global talent exchange platform is designed to enable businesses of all sizes to access highly skilled tech talent from around the world, with a specialized focus on emerging technology roles. Leveraging an AI ecosystem and operating on SaaS and PaaS models, Globaltalex also offers business consulting to empower organizations to scale, compete internationally, pursue innovation, and seamlessly achieve their goals. With a customer-centric approach to recruitment and a rich community network, the platform supports key business objectives such as building a more diverse and inclusive workforce by addressing workforce and employee diversity initiatives. It functions as a comprehensive solution encompassing aspects of recruitment agencies, HR consulting providers, recruiting automation software, and broader talent and workforce management.
